name: Be the protagonist!
description: So many movies have been set in Venice! If you love cinema and stars this is your tour! We will meet Indiana Jones places or Rialto Market where Johnny Deep runs away in "The Tourist". There is also the possibility to live the set of famous italian movies like "Death in Venice" of Luchino Visconti or less known but full of lovely places like "Dieci Inverni". You can choose the area and I will go with you throughout a very special Venice!!We will also walk together through history, culture and legends.
